snippet: Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan outlined his vision for his presidential campaign, promising to expand rights and liberties, improve welfare programs and build up the country’s economy.
abstract: Turkish Prime Min Recep Tayyip Erdogan outlines his vision for his presidential campaign, promising to expand rights and liberties, improve welfare programs and build up Turkey's economy; Turkey's president will be chosen directly by voters for first time in August.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan outlined his vision for his presidential campaign, promising to expand rights and liberties, improve welfare programs and build up the country’s economy.
